-58a50605: What is ngold and how does it work?
-6630c31e: NGOLD is a digital platform that modernizes traditional gold chit funds, allowing users to invest in gold through monthly contributions. Your purchased gold is securely stored and can be monitored anytime via our user-friendly app.
-6a4a5b4f: Is my investment secure with ngold?
528544b3: Your investment with NGOLD is secured in a vault and backed by cutting-edge technology to ensure the highest levels of security and compliance with financial regulations. We prioritize transparency and customer trust in all our operations.
6f67f615: How does the referral program work?
57e7e487: Our referral program rewards you for bringing new investors to NGOLD; simply share your unique referral code and earn a commission or discount on your next investment when someone signs up and invests using your code. The more people you refer, the more you earn.
-384aa44d: Can I track my installment payments?
2ec7b831: Yes, you can easily track your installment payments through our secure, user-friendly app, which provides real-time updates and a complete payment history for your convenience. This ensures full transparency in your investment journey with NGOLD.

-4d162e05: CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)
-40e7a3dc: Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:
-563a134b: Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.
7690b9d5: Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.
2a029550: Request that a business that sells a consumer's personal data, not sell the consumer's personal data.
-35f2f74c: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
-2858e7d9: We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:
-1af41bc: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
-3460a3f: The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.
b835d4a: The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
-6c0e6423: The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
-43def154: The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
137acb63: The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
